title: Pain Tracker
subtitle: Record and track your menstrual pain to understand patterns and find the most effective relief methods
description: Help manage your menstrual health by keeping detailed pain records

form.title: Pain Record
form.notesPlaceholder: Record any additional information such as triggers, mood, etc...

entries.title: Pain Records
entries.noEntriesDescription: Start recording your pain information to better understand pain patterns
entries.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this record? This action cannot be undone.
entries.deleteError: Failed to delete record, please try again

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.noDataDescription: Add more records to view statistical analysis

export.title: Export Data
export.description: Export your pain records as files for backup or sharing with healthcare providers

insights.title: Health Insights
insights.noInsightsDescription: Record more data to get personalized health insights

settings.title: Settings
settings.clearDataWarning: This action will permanently delete all pain records and cannot be undone
settings.clearDataError: Failed to clear data, please try again

messages.saveError: Failed to save record, please try again
messages.updateError: Failed to update record, please try again
messages.loadError: Failed to load data, please refresh the page
messages.networkError: Network error, please check your connection
messages.duplicateDate: A record for this date already exists, please choose another date or edit the existing record
messages.assessmentCompleteDesc: Your personalized recommendations have been generated
messages.assessmentFailedDesc: Unable to generate assessment results, please try again
messages.resultsSavedDesc: You can view your assessment results anytime

assessment.title: Symptom Assessment
assessment.subtitle: Answer a few questions about your symptoms to get personalized advice for managing menstrual pain
assessment.description: This assessment will help you understand the severity of your symptoms and get targeted recommendations

start.title: Start Symptom Assessment
start.description: This assessment takes approximately 5-10 minutes to complete
start.disclaimer: This assessment is for reference only and cannot replace professional medical advice

validation.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one option
validation.invalidRange: Please select a value within the valid range

constitutionTest.title: TCM Constitution Test
constitutionTest.subtitle: Discover your TCM constitution type through 8 carefully designed questions and get personalized acupoint massage, dietary therapy, and lifestyle recommendations to help you better manage your menstrual health.

instructions.title: Test Instructions
instructions.item1: Please answer based on your actual condition in the past 3 months
instructions.item2: Select only one most suitable answer for each question
instructions.item3: Test results are for reference only and cannot replace professional medical advice
instructions.item4: It is recommended to complete the test in a quiet environment

lifestyle.title: Scenario-Based Life Guidance
lifestyle.description: Based on your constitution characteristics, we provide targeted health advice for different life scenarios to help you take better care of yourself in various environments.
lifestyle.reminderText: These suggestions are tailored to your constitution characteristics. Please apply them flexibly based on your actual situation. Continue to monitor body changes and adjust lifestyle accordingly.

messages.testCompleteDesc: Your constitution analysis results have been generated
messages.testFailedDesc: Unable to generate test results, please try again
